snippet: Raul Ibanez’s three-run homer in the sixth canceled out Jesus Montero’s solo shot in the top of the inning and helped back a solid outing from Hiroki Kuroda.
abstract: New York Yankees defeat Seattle Mariners, 6-2, aided by Yankees outfielder Raul Ibanez's three-run homer.
lead_paragraph: Raul Ibanez’s three-run homer in the sixth canceled out Jesus Montero’s solo shot in the top of the inning and helped back a solid outing from Hiroki Kuroda.

headline.seo: Raul Ibanez’s Homer Helps Yankees Top Mariners
headline.main: Ibanez’s Homer Assures That Montero’s Blast Doesn’t Haunt Yankees
headline.print_headline: Ibanez’s Homer Assures That Montero’s Blast Doesn’t Haunt Yankees
